data.actual_result: The selector isn't scrollable which causes the text below the invisible status to be unaccessible in landscape mode.
data.expected_result: The selector is scrollable so as to see the the text below the invisible status.
data.short_description: When you set your font to the largest size and open the presence selector in landscape mode, the text below the inivisible presence vanishes.
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your font size to the largest your device supports. - Switch to landscape mode. - Open the presence selector.
